metadata.title: CVE-2023-46734 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Symfony is a PHP framework for web and console applications and a set ofreusable PHP components. Starting in versions 2.0.0, 5.0.0, and 6.0.0 andprior to versions 4.4.51, 5.4.31, and 6.3.8, some Twig filters inCodeExtension use `is_safe=html` but don't actually ensure their input issafe. As of versions 4.4.51, 5.4.31, and 6.3.8, Symfony now escapes theoutput of the affected filters.

criterions.comment: symfony package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
